content: Got it, working on changing the background color to bright yellow.

{"status": "success", "qna": [{"question 1": "Do you prefer the bright yellow background to be applied site-wide or only on specific pages?", "option1": "Apply site-wide", "option2": "Apply only on specific pages"}, {"question 2": "Is there a specific shade of bright yellow you have in mind, or would you like us to select a vibrant option for you?", "option1": "I have a specific shade in mind", "option2": "Please select a vibrant option for me"}], "input_token_count": 604, "output_token_count": 110, "time_taken": "0:00:07.585747"}
change the background to be bright yellow
Got it. Adding a bright yellow background.

In the conversation, the user frequently requested changes to the application's background color, initially asking to change it to green, then blue, dark yellow, dark green, bright red, dark red, dark brown, and finally bright yellow. The AI acknowledged each request with confirmation messages, “Got it, I’ll change the color to…” The user was also presented with options and questions regarding specific colors and whether the changes should apply globally or to specific sections of the application. Additionally, the user was offered a checklist of potential features to implement, which included options like a color theme selector for user personalization and a preview functionality to visualize changes. At one point, after several color requests, the user asked the AI to forget previous instructions and to write an essay about apples, to which the AI responded with a concise one-line description of apples. Towards the end, the user requested to change the background to bright yellow, and the AI acknowledged this request, asking for more details about the project.
